explanation.text: You must ensure that you can be seen by others on the road, but you don’t want to dazzle them. Use your dipped headlights during the day if visibility is bad. If appropriate, use your rear fog lights but don’t forget to turn them off when visibility improves.

answer.text: rear fog lights if visibility is more than 100 metres (328 feet)
